name: backend
description: - Django 3.0.x - [Pipenv](https://pipenv.pypa.io/en/latest/) for dependencies and virtualenvs - [django-allauth](https://github.com/pennersr/django-allauth) for user registration - [Whitenoise](http://whitenoise.evans.io/en/stable/index.html) for static files - [Bootstrap v4](https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap) for styling - [django-debug-toolbar](https://github.com/jazzband/django-debug-toolbar) for debugging - [django-crispy-forms](https://github.com/django-crispy-forms/django-crispy-forms) for DRY forms
